scene_end_anchor: Artie was released from detention and met Barnaby at his tavern in Oakhaven. Barnaby appraised Artie's stats, revealing his 100% Crit Rate and 1 HP build. Artie learned that his unique stats make him a high-value economic resource and a target for talent scouts.
constraints: The 'Glass Soul' condition makes all incoming damage fatal for Artie.
Artie's HP is 1/1 (locked), Level is 3, and Crit Rate is 100%.
Artie's stamina is 10/100 following a drink at Barnaby's tavern.
depict Vane's level 52 presence as physically oppressive
inventory: CHAR_ARTIE -> Corporate ID Badge (status=equipped, container=lanyard)
next_action: Artie interacts with Vane, who attempts to intimidate or claim him due to his anomaly status.

chapter_so_far: Artie dies in a mundane but absurd vending machine accident, triggering a flicker in reality stability.
Artie met Fizz and committed to a glitchy 1 HP, 100% Crit build in the System Void.
Artie met Fizz and committed to a glitchy 1 HP, 100% Crit build in the System Void.
Artie finalized a high-risk 1 HP, 100% Crit build in the System Void.
Artie and Fizz arrived in the Slime Fields to begin the tutorial.
Artie arrived in the Slime Fields and faced his first combat encounter, realizing that his 1 HP build makes even tutorial enemies lethal.
Artie survived his first combat encounter in the Slime Fields through a reality-warping critical hit.
Artie reached Level 2, confirming the viability (and danger) of his glitchy build.
Artie's success in combat backfired when the System awarded him a cursed beacon that aggroed the entire tutorial zone.
Artie reached the safety of Oakhaven but was immediately flagged as a statistical anomaly by the city's security scanners and detained.
Artie met Barnaby and learned that his 100% Crit Rate makes him a high-value resource in Oakhaven.

last_scene: Artie was released from detention and made his way to Barnaby's tavern in Oakhaven.
He met Barnaby, who used Appraisal to reveal Artie's glitched 100% Crit Rate and 1 HP build.
Barnaby explained that 'Crits' are the primary currency in Oakhaven, making Artie a valuable target.
